alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:02AM EDT until April 08 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Forecast flooding increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Flint River near Griffin affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flint River near Griffin. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands, fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Newnan Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 4.9 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
